content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, and electrical_id updated to 21516.
- ElectricityGroup (id = 21516) connecting small electric poles at positions (10.5, 7.5), (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points [(-10.5, 16.0), (-10.5, 21.0)].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warnings [out of fuel], holding approximately 190 water units; connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)], updated fluid_system [97819], and steam output point (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING, holding around 99 water units; updated fluid_system [97819].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 97819, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 97818, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 97831, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 97830, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 97826, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 97835, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 97834, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 97837, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 97838, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 97839, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Fluid System Identifier Consistency and Connection Attempts:
  • Earlier connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [96491, 96575, 96657, 96741, 96823, 96907, 96989, 97073] failed to locate valid pipe groups.
  • Recent attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [97155, 97239, 97321, 97405, 97487, 97571, 97653, 97737] also resulted in no candidates being found near Position(-5.5, 19.5) with a search radius of 15.
  • Remediation: Ensure fluid_system identifiers are consistently updated across the network and verify connection parameters against the active configuration.

- Search Parameter and Pipeline Synchronization:
  • Repeated failures indicate a misalignment between configured search parameters and the actual positions or fluid_system values within the pipeline network.
  • Remediation: Adjust search radius and synchronize deployment logic with the real-time network configuration.
